column4: thebaggageâ†’ i think i know what's wrong with your setup: you have an incorrect APN set in your Mobile Broadband settings. it's a hostname, sometimes called "data waypoint" or similar by your carrier
Cheers for the idea. I assume the APN is the "telstra.internet" part(?) It's what I currently have entered, and it works fine through XP. Is it possible a locked modem could interfere with APN?
Cheers. Sadly, apn is correct (telstra.internet works fine in XP). Card (might be) locked, but to the network I'm connecting to to. Thanks for trying anyhow. :-)
Ahh - interesting. The Intrepid Mobile Connection installer suggests telstra.datapack, which works in neither XP nor Linux...I'll keep digging. Cheers.
